amendment.description: Amendment directs the Director of National Intelligence to study how we measure cyber attacks and report to the relevant committees in both a classified and unclassified format.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 13 printed in House Report 114-155 to direct the Director of National Intelligence to study how we measure cyber attacks and report to the relevant committees in both a classified and unclassified format.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wilson (SC) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Wilson (SC).
